title: [Client thread/INFO]: [net.minecraft.init.Bootstrap:func_179870_a:553]: #@!@...
author: oldyu
txt_content: [Client thread/INFO]: [net.minecraft.init.Bootstrap:func_179870_a:553]: #@!@# Game crashed! Crash report saved to: #@!@# C:\Users\ting4\Desktop\ads\FTB Sky Odyssey\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2019-08-31_15.38.20-client.txt各位大佬这是什么情况啊  玩着到了一个区域就卡  然后闪退

replies.author: ProperSAMA
replies.txt_content:
这行提示是告诉你，客户端把崩溃记录保存到C:\Users\ting4\Desktop\ads\FTB Sky Odyssey\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2019-08-31_15.38.20-client.txt了
如果想寻求帮助，请把这个文件的内容发出来
